follow_up_questions.selected_insight: Solomon Islands has the highest number of employed persons overall among Pacific Island Countries, while Niue has the lowest.
selected_facts: The highest (most) value of the Number of employed persons is Pacific Island Countries Solomon Islands.
The lowest (least) value of the Number of employed persons is Pacific Island Countries Niue.
In the Number of employed persons ranking of different Pacific Island Countries(s), the top three Pacific Island Countries(s) are Solomon Islands, Vanuatu, Solomon Islands .
In the Number of employed persons ranking of different Pacific Island Countries(s), the last three Pacific Island Countries(s) are Niue, Niue, Niue .
follow_up_questions.question: How does the number of employed persons vary across different Pacific Island Countries?
follow_up_questions.suggested_viz_title: Employment Numbers Across Pacific Island Countries
follow_up_questions.rationale: This question broadens understanding by comparing employment counts across all countries, highlighting distribution beyond just the highest and lowest extremes.

follow_up_questions.selected_insight: In both Solomon Islands and Vanuatu, the Agriculture and Fishing sector is the largest employer with a major share held by males.
selected_facts: The Sex Male accounts for 32.25% of the Number of employed persons when Pacific Island Countries is Solomon Islands.
The Economic sector Agriculture and Fishing accounts for 32.25% of the Number of employed persons when Pacific Island Countries is Solomon Islands.
The Sex Male accounts for 29.88% of the Number of employed persons when Pacific Island Countries is Vanuatu.
The Economic sector Agriculture and Fishing accounts for 29.88% of the Number of employed persons when Pacific Island Countries is Vanuatu.
follow_up_questions.question: How does the number of employed persons by sex differ across Pacific Island Countries within the Agriculture and Fishing sector?
follow_up_questions.suggested_viz_title: Gender Employment in Agriculture Across Countries
follow_up_questions.rationale: This question drills into gender disparities within the key economic sector across countries, revealing how male and female employment shares vary geographically.

follow_up_questions.selected_insight: Males consistently represent the highest number of employed persons compared to females across Pacific Island countries and economic sectors, with the highest employment occurring in Solomon Islands and Agriculture and Fishing sector for both sexes.
selected_facts: The highest (most) value of the Number of employed persons is Sex Male.
The lowest (least) value of the Number of employed persons is Sex Female.
The highest (most) value of the Number of employed persons is Pacific Island Countries Solomon Islands when Sex is Male.
The lowest (least) value of the Number of employed persons is Pacific Island Countries Niue when Sex is Male.
The highest (most) value of the Number of employed persons is Economic sector Agriculture and Fishing when Sex is Male.
The highest (most) value of the Number of employed persons is Economic sector Agriculture and Fishing when Sex is Female.
follow_up_questions.question: How does the number of employed persons differ by Sex across all Pacific Island Countries?
follow_up_questions.suggested_viz_title: Employed Persons by Sex Across Countries
follow_up_questions.rationale: This question compares employment volumes for each sex across countries to reveal gender employment distribution differences on a broad scale.

follow_up_questions.selected_insight: Agriculture and Fishing along with Wholesale and Retail are the top employment sectors for both males and females while Financial and Insurance for females and Social Work and Health for males rank lowest in employment.
selected_facts: In the Number of employed persons ranking of different Economic sector(s), the top three Economic sector(s) are Agriculture and Fishing, Agriculture and Fishing, Wholesale and Retail  when Sex is Female.

In the Number of employed persons ranking of different Economic sector(s), the last three Economic sector(s) are Financial and Insurance, Transportation and Storage, Transportation and Storage  when Sex is Female.

In the Number of employed persons ranking of different Economic sector(s), the top three Economic sector(s) are Agriculture and Fishing, Agriculture and Fishing, Wholesale and Retail  when Sex is Male.

In the Number of employed persons ranking of different Economic sector(s), the last three Economic sector(s) are Social Work and Health , Accommodation and Food, Wholesale and Retail  when Sex is Male.
follow_up_questions.question: How does the number of employed persons by Sex vary across Economic sectors?
follow_up_questions.suggested_viz_title: Employment Numbers by Sex Across Sectors
follow_up_questions.rationale: This question drills into employment differences between sexes within various economic sectors, highlighting sector-specific gender employment patterns.

selected_facts: The Sex Male accounts for 32.25% of the Number of employed persons when Pacific Island Countries is Solomon Islands.
The Economic sector Agriculture and Fishing accounts for 32.25% of the Number of employed persons when Pacific Island Countries is Solomon Islands.
The Sex Male accounts for 29.88% of the Number of employed persons when Pacific Island Countries is Vanuatu.
The Economic sector Agriculture and Fishing accounts for 29.88% of the Number of employed persons when Pacific Island Countries is Vanuatu.
Agriculture and Fishing is the predominant economic sector in terms of employment in both Solomon Islands and Vanuatu.
follow_up_questions.question: How does the number of employed persons differ by Economic sector and Sex in Solomon Islands?
follow_up_questions.suggested_viz_title: Employment by Sector and Sex in Solomon Islands
follow_up_questions.rationale: Solomon Islands has the highest number of employed persons and a significant portion in Agriculture and Fishing, with males holding a major share. Exploring employment distribution by Economic sector and Sex reveals gender roles within key sectors and deepens understanding of workforce composition.

selected_facts: The Sex Male accounts for 29.88% of the Number of employed persons when Pacific Island Countries is Vanuatu.
The Economic sector Agriculture and Fishing accounts for 29.88% of the Number of employed persons when Pacific Island Countries is Vanuatu.
Agriculture and Fishing is the predominant economic sector in terms of employment in both Solomon Islands and Vanuatu.
Employment in Solomon Islands and Vanuatu shows a mixed gender distribution with males generally ranking higher but females also prominent among the top ranks.

In the Number of employed persons ranking of different Economic sector(s), the top three Economic sector(s) are Agriculture and Fishing, Agriculture and Fishing, Wholesale and Retail when Pacific Island Countries is Vanuatu.
follow_up_questions.question: How does the number of employed persons differ by Economic sector and Sex in Vanuatu?
follow_up_questions.suggested_viz_title: Employment by Sector and Sex in Vanuatu
follow_up_questions.rationale: Vanuatu is a top-ranked country for employment and shows a similar economic sector dominance and gender distribution to Solomon Islands. Examining employment by Economic sector and Sex deepens insight into workforce characteristics and sector-specific gender dynamics.
